repliclust.constrained_overlap.gradients.chi2term_vectorized¶

repliclust.constrained_overlap.gradients.chi2term_vectorized(mharsum_vec, p)¶

Compute the chi2 term of the overlap gradients with respect to a reference cluster center vs all other centers (vectorized). Compute the harmonic sum of Mahalanobis distances (vectorized).

mharsum_vecndarray, shape (1, k-1)

Harmonic sum of Mahalanobis distances (vectorized).

pint

Dimensionality of the data (degrees of freedom for chi2).

outndarray, shape (1, k-1)

Chi2(p) density evaluated at the appropriate quantile cutoffs.

repliclust
